cancellationPolicies.label: Free Cancellation rates
cancellationPolicies.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 3rd Jan 2026 (NZDT) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 3rd Jan 2026 (NZDT) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.

privates.name: Deluxe Twin Room Private Ensuite
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: Room has two single beds and private bathroom amenities. Also includes a lounge chair, wardrobe, television, fridge and tea/coffee making facilities.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

privates.name: Double Bed Private Ensuite
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: Room has a Queen bed and private bathroom amenities. Also includes a lounge chair, wardrobe, television, fridge and tea/coffee making facilities. All linen is provided and rooms are serviced daily.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

privates.name: 3 Bed Private Shared Bathroom
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription:
Private room with three single beds and a shared bathroom right outside the room.

Room includes a compact table and chairs, wardrobe and smart television.  

Some have balcony access, add as a request for availability and we'll see what we can do.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.
